data.title: Good Bento Box - Bento Xpress
data.text: I went to Bento Xpress for lunch and enjoyed their chicken teriyaki.  I purchased their larger size so that it also came with rice, salad, and vegetables.  Food was nicely prepared and tasty.  With it I had a Hawaiian Sun Strawberry & Guava Necter. Service was good as well.

data.title: Quick Japanese Bento
data.text: It's not fantastic Japanese-Hawaiian food, but it is like being in the islands. Nice bento boxes- - cheap! Consistently good.  Great for take out.

data.title: YUMMY!!! Love Bento Express!! Best Bento Box!
data.text: I've been eating here since the early 1990's when I used to work around here. Today I had to work in the neighborhood again and I had to come here. I have been craving it for awhile. I usually get their #7 Bento Box teriyaki chicken, tempura, California rolls, salad, rice and soup. The teriyaki sauce is excellent, the tempura perfect, California rolls good, the salad dressing delicious and the soup flavorful. Bento Express has been consistently excellent for decades. Other establishments I've been to don't compare. The staff are always friendly and quick with a smile. The interior is nice and clean, plus the TV usually has surfing or another sport on. Usually I just get a water to drink, but this time I bought the Strawberry Guava drink. Oh the memories of Hawaiian Paradise strawberry gauva necture gives me. Deep Sigh... Come and enjoy your paradise at Bento Express!

data.title: Nice Meals and Reasonable Prices
data.text: Bento Xpress offers very nice bento box varieties as well as nice sushi. The salad and the soup are also delicious. The owners are very friendly and helpful.

data.title: Go-To Teriyaki Sauce
data.text: I've been going here since high school days, so 20+ years.  I've been to a lot of Japanese places and eaten a lot of teriyaki chicken, beef, salmon over the years that span all the prices ranges.  I always compare it to Bento Xpress, and none can compare to their teriyaki sauce which has a strong hint burst of shitake mushroom flavor.  Plus, they give you a ton of food for the price, which is lower than any Japanese restaurant you can think of.  This place better stay in business forever and never change their teriyaki recipe, because it would be a sad day if either ever happened.  I don't even know why I try teriyaki from any other place.

data.title: Good Chicken Teriyaki and Tonkatsu, Brown Rice and Salad - Friendly Service
data.text:
Since the evening was busy, we stopped in at Bento Xpress for dinner.  I had their bento box with chicken teriyaki and tonkatsu, brown rice, and salad.  Counter service was friendly and good.   I have rated it average as while I enjoyed dinner food was good but average for chicken teriyaki.  We ordered the meal "take out" style. 

The restaurant has received the Best of Milpitas awards in their category for a number of years.   They have also been mentioned on Jay Leno many yaers ago as they serve Hawaiian spam dishes; there is a posting on the wall on this.

There is both take out and dine in service.

I would recommend it for a good casual meal.  They are a Japanese California style quick cuisine type place.

data.title: expensive, expensive for very average food
data.text: We have take out once in awhile. Their food is blended and not tasty, little production value, and expensive for what you get. Dinner for 3 can easily cost over $40 take out.

data.title: it was okay, but i like...
data.text: it was okay, but i like fujisan and the place in the valley fair mall better
